short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper extension to send Turbo BYOP messages via Google Voice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a helper extension that enables users of the TurboBYOP extension to use Google Voice as the messaging application for sending their text messages.
